title: New Atheists, Flat Earth, and the History of Doubt (with Alec Ryrie)
itunes:title: New Atheists, Flat Earth, and the History of Doubt with Alec Ryrie
description:
Alec Ryrie, the author of Unbelievers: An Emotional History of Doubt, joins Jessa to discuss how faith and doubt operate together, skepticism as a contagion, and the legacy of the New Atheists. 

Support this podcast: http://patreon.com/publicintellectual

http://jessacrispin.com
